allow:
Bash(echo "IP management functionality has been successfully implemented! 

Key features implemented:
- F6/i: IP Management dashboard with banned IP overview and quick actions
- F8/b: Detailed banned IP management with navigation and unban functionality
- F9/w: Whitelist management with add/remove functionality
- Interactive dialogs for banning IPs with jail selection
- Confirmation dialogs for unbanning operations
- Navigation with arrow keys and keyboard shortcuts

The application should now provide full IP management capabilities as specified in the requirements.")
Bash(RUST_LOG=debug rustc --extern env_logger --extern f2b_buxjr=target/debug/libf2b_buxjr.rlib -L target/debug/deps test_jail_loading.rs -o test_jail_loading)
Bash(RUST_LOG=debug rustc --extern env_logger --extern f2b_buxjr=target/release/libf2b_buxjr.rlib -L target/release/deps test_app_jail_loading.rs -o test_app_jail_loading)
